comments.body: why this change?  (also, we could possibly use DoubleToStringConverter to implement all of DoubleToBuffer?)  (but see the question about android code size as well).

The previous implementation of DoubleToBuffer function was using old locale_independent_strtonum<double> which is replaced by double_conversion::StringToDoubleConverter with slightly differen interface.

But it is a good point to use only one function to convert str to double everywhere here. Consider double_conversion::StringToDoubleConverter only as hidden implementation details of safe_strto{d,f}.

This is a good idea to use double-conversion for {Double,Float}ToBuffer functions. I can do it here or in another pull request.
